label: Pairing
comment: The process by which two potentially communicating entities are linked.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the method by which this cross-border customs valuation is determined.
The indication of whether or not the entity is paired in this communication pairing.
The identifier of the target entity for this communication pairing.

objectProperties.comment: A matching event for this communication pairing.

referencedBy.comment: A sensor communication pairing reported for this monitoring IOT device.
